name: Mac Classic Beta - Interactive Components Examples
description:
Playing around with Figma's awesome new variants and interactive components feature through a rough reproduction of Apple's Mac OS 2.0. This is by no means pixel perfect and is for entertainment purposes only :)


Notes:


  • Font's are not 1:1, I used a good but not perfect match. If anyone can provide otf/ttfs of the original system fonts- drop us a message.  
  • Main Apple Menu works, however isn hooked up to anything, just to show proof of concept around the interactive variants.  
  • Figma [on Desktop] - is just an simple example of what else could be accomplished with interactive elements (mouse required) 


Current limitations we have encountered:


Inability to move or resize windows

“Mouse Up” interactions don’t work in combination with hovering over a modal...


Feel free to duplicate the file and explore for yourself. Send us a message if you figured out solutions to the limitations we listed above, or a smarter way to go about building such a prototype!
